emenma sinhalen demala bhashawa ha hindu dharmaya igena ganimen demala samajaya therum ganimata mahopakari wanu atha.demala katha kala haki bhikshun wahansela demala gamniyamgam ha kandawuruwalata wadama kirima ha haki thak durata demala bhashawen demala janaya samanga katha kirima, buddhagama gana demala bhashawen liyana lada pahasu poth pradanaya kirima wani katayuthuª kirimata polambaawanne nam sinhala bauddhaya gana demala janaya wishwasayak goda nanga gannawata amatharawa sinhala bauddhaya ha buddhagama therum ganimata da eya hethu wanu atha.nithignya upali welarathna kotteragama polis bala pradeshayata ayath galwala handiyata saha walipillawa mansandhiyata polis marga badhaka awashyaya.
